divs: sighting detailslast night (on halloween) i was about to leave our church harvest festival that my wife and myself had brought our daughter i saw something strange in the sky that i have never seen before. i am a sky watcher, so i am always looking for things, my wife like to make fun of me, but its things like this that are the reason i am the way i am. as i made my way to my vehicle, for some reason my eyes were drawn the the sky, i thought i was looking at the north star, i am not good with n, s, e, w directions so i can't tell you exactly which direction i was facing. i was on yosemite blvd. , highway 132 facing teel middle school, you can probably find the direction i was facing by those landmarks on google earth.) as i glanced at the "star" it must have been just the right moment because it seemed to flare, and then slowly, burn out. it also never moved. it was stationary in sky the whole time, like the stars are, thats why i thought it was a star. it was like nothing i have ever, ever seen before. i am experienced in watching the sky, and i know it was abnormal, what i am extremely interested in is knowing if anyone else saw this star\occurance in the sky, because it would not have been stationary to my town, let alone state, it was something in space, i know multiple people had to have seen it. here's hoping someone did, and can share what they saw with us all and at least confirm what i saw. please contact me at audioinklined@sbcglobal.net if you have any information concerning this event please! i am completely sincere. i didn't tell anyone about it, except my wife i think. it was very strange.
